textAfterTable: About National Oxygen Ltd. National Oxygen Ltd., incorporated in the year 1974, is a Small Cap company (having a market cap of Rs 21.03 Cr.) operating in Chemicals sector. National Oxygen Ltd. key Products/Revenue Segments include Gases Industrial which contributed Rs 27.37 Cr to Sales Value (92.60% of Total Sales), Wind Energy which contributed Rs 1.70 Cr to Sales Value (5.74% of Total Sales), Other Services which contributed Rs 0.32 Cr to Sales Value (1.09% of Total Sales), Other Operating Revenue which contributed Rs 0.09 Cr to Sales Value (0.31% of Total Sales), Other Products which contributed Rs 0.07 Cr to Sales Value (0.23% of Total Sales), for the year ending 31-Mar-2014. For the quarter ended 31-Mar-2015, the company has reported a Standalone sales of Rs. 6.06 Cr., down -1.38% from last quarter Sales of Rs. 6.14 Cr. and down -11.29% from last year same quarter Sales of Rs. 6.83 Cr. Company has reported net profit after tax of Rs. -2.03 Cr. in latest quarter. The company’s management includes Mr.S Shanmuga Sundaram, Ms.Lakshmmi Subramanian, Ms.Lakshmmi Subramanian, Dr.D M Mohunta, Mr.Anil Seth, Mr.G N Saraf, Mr.P Siva, Mr.Rajesh Kumar Saraf, Mrs.Veena Devi Saraf. Company has Singhi & Co. as its auditors. As on 30-Jun-2015, the company has a total of 4,802,271 shares outstanding.
